content: First, a benchtop system that leverages a standard laboratory workflow and includes customer-friendly analysis software will enable more researchers to have the technology in their lab, enabling a larger number of researchers with a new technology like next-generation protein sequencing will be critical to accelerating the pace of proteomics research globally. With an amazing technical team already in place here at Quantum-Si, I can focus more of my time on building out the commercial organization and setting the market development strategy for our next-generation protein sequencing technology.
